snippet: A Chinese solar panel maker, Suntech Power Holdings, said an internal investigation had determined that the company was defrauded by a partner in a solar development fund.
abstract: Chinese solar panel maker Suntech Power Holdings says an internal investigation has determined that the company was defrauded by a partner in a solar development fund.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese solar panel maker, Suntech Power Holdings, said an internal investigation had determined that the company was defrauded by a partner in a solar development fund.

headline.main: Fraud Accusation by Solar Panel Maker
headline.print_headline: Fraud Accusation By Solar Panel Maker
